network 192.168.1.0/24

netw 11000000 10101000 00000001 00000000
mask 11111111 11111111 11111111 00000000

Subnet A:
netw 	11000000 10101000 00000001 00000000 	- 192.168.1.0
mask 	11111111 11111111 11111111 11000000	- 255.255.255.192 / 26

1st IP	11000000 10101000 00000001 00000001 	- 192.168.1.1
last IP 11000000 10101000 00000001 00111110 	- 192.168.1.62
bdcast	11000000 10101000 00000001 00111111 	- 192.168.1.63

Subnet B:
netw 	11000000 10101000 00000001 01000000	- 192.168.1.64
mask	11111111 11111111 11111111 11100000	- 255.255.255.224 / 27

1st IP	11000000 10101000 00000001 01000001	- 192.168.1.65
last IP	11000000 10101000 00000001 01011110	- 192.168.1.94
bdcast	11000000 10101000 00000001 01011111	- 192.168.1.95


Subnet C:
netw 	11000000 10101000 00000001 01100000	- 192.168.1.96
mask	11111111 11111111 11111111 11110000	- 255.255.255.240 / 28

1st IP	11000000 10101000 00000001 01100001	- 192.168.1.97
last IP	11000000 10101000 00000001 01101110	- 192.168.1.110
bdcast	11000000 10101000 00000001 01101111	- 192.168.1.111
